verses.text: \w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w again|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* Aaron, \w telling|strong="H1696"\w* \w them|strong="H3068"\w*,

“\w Say|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w*, ‘\w Of|strong="H1121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w beasts|strong="H2416"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* earth, \w these|strong="H1696"\w* \w ones|strong="H1121"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w may|strong="H3478"\w* eat:

\w You|strong="H3605"\w* may eat \w any|strong="H3605"\w* animal \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w has|strong="H3605"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w split|strong="H8156"\w* \w hoof|strong="H6541"\w* \w completely|strong="H3605"\w* \w divided|strong="H6536"\w* \w and|strong="H5927"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w chews|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w cud|strong="H1625"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H3808"\w* \w those|strong="H1931"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w only|strong="H3588"\w* \w chew|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w cud|strong="H1625"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w only|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w divided|strong="H6536"\w* \w hoof|strong="H6541"\w*, \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H5927"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H5927"\w* eat \w the|strong="H3588"\w* following:\f + \fr 11:4 \ft The precise identification of some of the birds and animals in this chapter is uncertain.\f* The camel, though it chews the cud, does not have a divided hoof; it is unclean for you.
The rock badger,\f + \fr 11:5 \ft Or The coney or The hyrax\f* though it chews the cud, does not have a divided hoof; it is unclean for you.
The rabbit, though it chews the cud, does not have a divided hoof; it is unclean for you.
And the pig, though it has a split hoof completely divided, does not chew the cud; it is unclean for you.

\w You|strong="H3808"\w* \w must|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* eat \w their|strong="H1992"\w* \w meat|strong="H1320"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w touch|strong="H5060"\w* \w their|strong="H1992"\w* \w carcasses|strong="H5038"\w*; \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w are|strong="H1992"\w* \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w* \w for|strong="H3808"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w*.

Additionally, \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w are|strong="H1992"\w* \w to|strong="H4480"\w* \w detest|strong="H8262"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* following \w birds|strong="H5775"\w*, \w and|strong="H5775"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w must|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* eaten \w because|strong="H4480"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w are|strong="H1992"\w* \w detestable|strong="H8263"\w*: the eagle, the bearded vulture, the black vulture,
the kite, any kind of falcon,
any kind of raven,
the ostrich,\f + \fr 11:16 \ft Literally the daughter of the ostrich or the daughter of the owl\f* the screech owl, the gull, any kind of hawk,
the little owl, the cormorant, the great owl,
the white owl, the desert owl, the osprey,
the stork, any kind of heron, the hoopoe, and the bat.
